name: The Flying Feathers
description:
The player will play the role of Nia, who accidentally enters Alice's past memories on the train to her best friend Alice's graduation ceremony. The only way to escape the illusion and return to the real world is to help Alice solve all the problems she is currently facing.

Examine every clue around you to understand the current story and dilemma that Alice is facing.


Collect clues and solve puzzles to help Alice solve her troubles or fulfill her current wishes.



Experience the journey and learn about what happened to Alice.


During this process, Nia gradually learned about everything Alice had gone through. If she could go back to the past and start all over again, would there still be any regrets left?

The Flying Feathers is a first-person narrative game, which combines interactive experience and cutscenes to immerse players in the story.
